column12: METHODS FOR PAIN TREATMENT USING RESINIFERATOXIN
column13: Methods for treating pain using resiniferatoxin. The resiniferatoxin may be administered to certain anatomic sites using image-guided delivery. The resiniferatoxin may be administered in low doses in the range of 0.5 to 3.0 μg of resiniferatoxin in a human patient. The resiniferatoxin may cause the partial or total ablation of nerve afferents associated with the pain response.
column14: SORRENTO THERAPEUTICS INC;;MAYO FOUND MEDICAL EDUCATION & RES
column15: ROYAL MIKE;;JONES BRYAN;;BEUTLER ANDREAS S;;MAUS TIMOTHY P
column16: MAYO FOUNDATION FOR MEDICAL EDUCATION AND RESEARCH (2018-05-07)

column12: MATERIALS AND METHODS FOR TREATING REGIONAL PAIN
column13: This document provides materials and methods for treating regional pain. For example, compositions including one or more analgesics can be selectively administered (e.g., by image-guided injection) to one or more nerves to treat a mammal having regional pain.
column15: BEUTLER ANDREAS S;;MAUS TIMOTHY P;;ANDERSON JEFF R;;UNGER JR MARK DANIEL
